statements: DELETE FROM iris_scan_data WHERE user_id = 10 AND scan_date < '2022-01-01';

DELETE FROM iris_scan_data WHERE scan_date >= '2022-02-01' AND user_id = 5678;

DELETE FROM audit_trail WHERE execution_timestamp > '2022-02-01' AND query_text LIKE '%SELECT%';
